title: RIP Tristana
body:
Welp.
Nerfed range, nerfed base health, nerfed armor, removed grievous wounds, eviscerated attack speed.
Added an ability that does, at BEST, about 2.5 autoattacks worth of damage....probably the same 2.5 more autoattacks she'd have had pre 'rework'.

It's been a fun few years. I've been playing her since S1, and she was a big part of my LoL experience.

But she is *dead* now.

Anyone else upset about this?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Datavore,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mzQyr3uM,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-28T06:15:34.143+0000)
>
> Welp.
> Nerfed range, nerfed base health, nerfed armor, removed grievous wounds, eviscerated attack speed.

Tristana starts off with the range of a typical ADC, and has range that scales, which automatically puts her a leg above {{champion:104}}  and {{champion:133}} and {{champion:15}}.  By the time she hits level 12 her range is almost {{champion:51}}'s, and by 18 she's got better range than {{champion:222}} with Fishbones, whilst being free cost on AAs while having splash damage on minion kills.  This is going to be nerfed, yes, but she's still going to have range greater than Caitlyn by level 18, with the same bursty dueling capabilities to boot.

In addition, Tristana's E was cancer.  Grievous wounds and damage over time is some of the most toxic shit in the game, hence why they are removing Tristana's old E and it on Fizz's W.  Miss Fortune gets a free pass because her only DOT is her E, which isn't tacked onto the greivous wounds, you need to activate two expensive abilities for that to work.  
> Added an ability that does, at BEST, about 2.5 autoattacks worth of damage....probably the same 2.5 more autoattacks she'd have had pre 'rework'.

You have a champ that automatically one ups most ADCs' range by the time she levels up for the first time, and she trumps almost all of them by the time she hits level 9, with the exceptions being Caitlyn and Jinx.  That coupled with high attack speed, an AOE splash damage gap closer that can be used as an escape upon a kill or assist, and you've got a champion with very little counterplay once she gets rolling.  The attack speed was a tradeoff for counterplay, especially with this new E she's getting.  Despite this, I'm pretty sure she's still going to be bursting down your carries and dunking your towers.
> 
> It's been a fun few years. I've been playing her since S1, and she was a big part of my LoL experience.
> 
> But she is *dead* now.
> 
> Anyone else upset about this?

And finally, you are making a hyperbole about a champion retune that HASN'T BEEN RELEASED YET.  FFS, I want to slam my head against my keyboard every time someone whines about a new champion being the next Xin Zhao on release, or being Gnar bad. Unless you're a PBE tester, you don't have any experience with the champ.  Do I think the new numbers are a little low?  Yes I do actually, and I think Rito's going to adjust the patch after, because they are going to get a HELLUVA LOT OF DATA FROM ALL THE PEOPLE PLAYING A CHAMP YOU CAN GET FREE ON FACEBOOK.  Is she DEAD now?  Fuck no.  She's going to get the shit played out of her when the patch rolls around, just like Karthus and Twitch did, and people are going to say she's OP/UP, the whole nonsense that always happens.  

TR;DL, quit whining about reworks, Riot did it because the champ lacked counterplay and couldn't balance her without changes, same thing happened to a lot of champions before.  I predict that she's going to be weak on release, but she's far from dead, and outside a new E and weaker stats, she's still Tristy.  I lump posts like yours with the millions of silent "mains" of a champ that immediately circlejerk about how "RITO RHUINED MAH CHAMP!!1!" the instant a rework goes live.

Edit:  Cue the downvotes and flame me and call me a moron or whatever instead of actually making a solid argument, because this is the internet and the league community after all...
....Still a nerf. I would have been a happy camper had they retained grievous wounds. She still will be fun to play; just have to get a bit closer to the action now before I jump in and save the day.

Tristana's new kit is better than her old kit. Hands Down.

The ability to cast your E on towers makes it hard for the enemy team to tower farm/stay under tower low HP and that annoying DOT that always kept you from going in tower range is no longer there. Her E is pretty much a Zilean Bomb.

Her W also blows the E up, which adds TONS of dmg, not to mention if you jump in on 3+ people with the E active, you're getting a lot of extra dmg on everyone as it's AoE.

"She is a super strong late game carry who needs meaningful weaknesses." So her meaningful weakness should just be no more late game Trist do to no AS without Q and even with it she wont be fast unless you trade a damage item for AS.....
2.5% AS per level nerf on a champ who was fine before skill range buffs. God hope graves players are happy they will be able to out AS trist now.

Don't be all doomsday when the rework just came out. Give it a week for someone to figure out the new best build on her before you declare her dead. 

I mean, I see how the big hits to her base damages and base values could look like it's a big hit, but the reality is that Tristana has always been a late game champion anyways. Her new E actually does crazy damage at level 5 because of the damage amp from autoattacking and the 1.1 bonus AD ratio; an AD ratio is something she's never had that will greatly improve her infamously weak midgame.

That's not to say that she'll necessarily lose strength in the laning phase either. At level 9 maxing REQW, her E->AAx4->W combo does 360 (+2.0 AP) (+2.2 bonus AD) before resistances, and that's leaving out the damage of the four autoattacks, and this damage is all in an AoE. Catch their ADC+support next to each other and the Rocket Jump reset means you just got a double kill. 

Did she take a lot of number hits? Yeah. But because of her sheer damage potential with Explosive Shot (which also works against towers, by the way), I think we should give the rework a week or so before we start with talk of her being dead.
